Uses of Package
jam.data.control

Packages that use jam.data.control
jam Root package for the Jam software package. 
jam.data.control Dialogs for manipulating histograms, gates, scalers, real-time monitors, and data parameters. 
 

Classes in jam.data.control used by jam
HistogramControl
          Class to control the histograms Allows one to zero the histograms and create new histograms
ScalerControl
          Reads and displays the scaler values.
 

Classes in jam.data.control used by jam.data.control
DataControl
          A class to do overall control of the Jam data classes.
GateControl
          Class to set 1 D and 2 D gates.
